mapper.select: SELECT uf.id, uf.follower_id, uf.following_id, uf.created_at, u_follower.username as follower_username, u_follower.nickname as follower_nickname, u_follower.avatar as follower_avatar, u_following.username as following_username, u_following.nickname as following_nickname, u_following.avatar as following_avatar, CASE WHEN uf_reverse.id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as is_mutual_follow FROM user_follows uf INNER JOIN users u_follower ON uf.follower_id = u_follower.id INNER JOIN users u_following ON uf.following_id = u_following.id LEFT JOIN user_follows uf_reverse ON uf.following_id = uf_reverse.follower_id AND uf.follower_id = uf_reverse.following_id WHERE uf.follower_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uf.created_at DESC
